text:
e="preserve">Faith Alupo (9 October 1983 – 15 September 2020) was a Ugandan politician. She was a Member of Parliament, representing the Pallisa District. She was elected to that position in June 2018. She was a member of the National Resistance Movement.
Alupo died on 15 September 2020 in Kampala, Uganda from COVID-19 at the age of 36.
